jobdesk: Developing and maintaining modern web applications
description: Focused on building responsive and accessible UI using Next.js, React, and Tailwind. Collaborated with backend engineers to deliver features with optimized performance.

jobdesk: Designing user interfaces and improving user experience
description: Created wireframes, prototypes, and design systems for multiple client projects. Conducted usability testing to validate design decisions.

description: Handled both frontend and backend development using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Deployed scalable applications on AWS and improved CI/CD pipelines.

jobdesk: Supporting the development team in building e-learning platforms
description: Assisted in developing features for a learning management system. Gained hands-on experience with Git workflows, Agile methodology, and testing tools.
